name: Frozen Essence
description:
In a world balanced by essence, Mina is unsealed from her crystal prison. Without a memory of her own, she follows the guidance from the oracle and is protected from those that fear her dark power. With the guidance from the oracle and protection from her bodyguards, her journey begins.

This is an otome visual novel, an interactive, romance story with choices that affect the ending.  Each path's story differs greatly depending on the path you land on.

This is my first release and it is free.  Since it's my first project, I apologize in advance for the grammatical errors, low quality art and other assets. If you like this, check out my current works at unbrokenhours.com

Extra: I have lost the raw files to update this game so if the game does not work on newer versions of mac, I apologize.
